title: Moonrider Outpost
text: Raiders have begun fighting over disputed grain fields.
blocka: When threat comes into play, add progress counters equal to Diplomacy.
blockb: xxACTION Brokering Peace. Test (Rapport 4). If passed, add one progress counter.
blockc: xxWATER Raid. Remove one progress counter from this threat. If there are none to remove, spend 3 xxFOOD or lose 1 xxSTABILITY.
blockd: xxCIRCLE After mission, burn threat if it has any progress counters.

title: Silk Roads
text: If you aren't building relationships - you will be left behind.
blocka: When threat comes into play, add progress counters equal to Technology.
blockb: xxACTION Construction. Spend 9 xxTIMBER to add one progress counter.
blockc: xxFIRE Levy. Remove one progress counter from this threat. If there are none to remove, lose 1 xxLUXURY die.
blockd: xxCIRCLE After mission, burn threat if it has any progress counters.

title: The Necromancer
text: A cloaked figure hangs above the ground, limp and lifeless, but the power exuding from it tells you that it is not all that it seems.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb
blockb: xxACTION Circle of Banishing. May take this action only if there are no Restless Dead at this location. Test (Lore 4). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxAIR Enervation Spell. One character at a North Oaks location takes 2 xxBODY.
blockd: xxBUST Summoning Circle. If possible, find and play a Restless Dead card from the encounter deck before reshuffling.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to Undari's Tomb.
blockb: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockc: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockd: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to Mirror Woods.
blockb: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockc: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockd: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Dead, grey eyes stare back at you, liveliness long gone and replaced with a blank stare.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The soulless husk limping towards you reeks of rotting flesh.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature's face is sagging to one side, like wax placed in a flame, their features beyond recognition. The very image of them sends shivers down your spine.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature groans, the sound of bare bone scraping painfully against the earth echoing in your ears.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Clearly victims of a terrible pox, come back to share their misery.
blocka: xxACTION Battle the Undead. Test (Combat). For every two successes, burn one Restless Dead at this location.
blockb: xxEARTH The Hunger. Move one location right.
blockc: xxWATER Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: See it for Myself
text: Menas scouts the northern wilds looking for signs of the Empire.
blocka: xxACTION Signs of Sorcerous Danger. Spend 5 xxPROGRESS and make Menas weary. Then improve Menas's Motivation and burn this card.
blockb: xxAIR Veteran of the Old War. If Menas is at a North Oaks location, gain 2 xxPROGRESS.
blockc: xxWATER Take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Grueling Wilds
text: The weather in North Oaks is wild and unpredictable.
blocka: xxACTION Risky Shelter. Test (Survival 2). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxFIRE Extreme Fatigue. Spend 1 xxFOOD or one character at a North Oaks location is weary.

title: The Standing Stone
text: Scribbled on a stone are what appear to be coded Imperial messages. Who from Red Bank is sending these messages?
blocka: Gain xxPROGRESS equal to xxRISK and burn card.

title: The Last Necromancer
text: There are signs that the Necromancer of North Oaks was not alone. But was he master... or servant?
blocka: Take xxBODY equal to xxRISK and burn card.

title: Wandering Sprite
text: Out of the mists, a shimmering figure appears, no bigger than a toad.
blocka: Gain xxMANA dice equal to xxRISK and burn card.

title: Dense Forest
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Dense Forest
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Dense Forest
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Abandoned Mine
text: Scattered mines from old Amber Hand outposts can still be found in the forest.
blocka: Gain 1 xxORE die.

title: Sudden Storm
text: Stop whining and keep moving! You want to freeze to death?
blocka: Take 2 xxDISCORD.

title: A Failed Defense
text: The casualties of a long forgotten war echo their pain and anger into the forest.
blocka: Take xxBODY equal to xxRISK.

title: Eldritch Energy
text: Ripples of magic ebb out from some chaotic source deeper within the forest.
blocka: Test (Lore 2). If passed, gain 2 xxPROGRESS. Otherwise, take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Forest Boar
text: Hey Keel, could you peek your head in there and see if it's empty?
blocka: Test (Combat 2). If passed, gain 1 xxPROGRESS. Otherwise, one character taking the test is weary.

title: Rocky Terrain
text: I know! But your footing doesn't look so good!
blocka: Test (Survival 2). If you pass, gain 2 xxPROGRESS. Otherwise, take 2 xxBODY.

title: Radiant Fernbrake
text: The pale red plant has a vast number of uses. However, it is very difficult to harvest correctly.
blocka: Test (Command xxRISK). If passed, gain 1 xxLUXURY die. Otherwise, take 1 xxBODY.

title: Ile
text: Ile is best equipped to see through the veil of sorcery. She harbors anger from being separated from her people, the Moonriders.
blocka: Attach to Horsethief Meadows.
blockb: xxACTION Ending Ile's Curse. Test (Lore 2). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxWATER Ile's Gift. Gain 1 xxMANA die.

title: Past Deals
text: Ask yourself, aren't you also responsible for how bad things have become?
blocka: Attach to Hogel Manor.
blockb: xxACTION Look Toward the Future. Test (Command 3). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Family Honor
text: What is your great society if it doesn't value families?
blocka: Attach to Hogel Manor.
blockb: xxACTION Build Bridges. Test (Rapport 3). If passed, burn card.
blockc: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.

title: Dashen
text: The young swordsman displays his worth to Arban by testing what the diplomats from Red Bank know of horse lore.
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 3). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxAIR Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.
blockc: xxWATER Take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Hogel
text: Hah! You think Arban rules the Sunriders? But who has the will of the people?
blocka: xxACTION Test (Rapport 3). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxAIR Lose 2 xxPROGRESS at this location.
blockc: xxFIRE Take 2 xxDISCORD.

title: Border Raids
text: The Moonriders continue to attack us from the east.
blocka: xxACTION Test (Tactics 3). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.
blockc: xxAIR Take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Depleted Mana
text: The lake has been too hungry to think about much else.
blocka: xxACTION Test (Lore 3). If passed, burn card.
blockb: xxEARTH Lose 1 xxPROGRESS at this location.
blockc: xxAIR Take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Stronger Together
text: And yet neither of us wants to live under the yoke of tyranny.
blocka: xxACTION Courage and Conviction. Test (Command 3). If passed, improve Thea's Motivation and burn this card.
blockb: xxEARTH I've Come Too Far! If Thea is at a Sunriders mission location, gain 2 xxPROGRESS where Thea is located.
blockc: xxWATER Take 1 xxDISCORD.

title: Rumors of Smoke
text: It is madness to beseech the wyrm Pelakhar for aid.
blocka: Take xxDISCORD equal to xxRISK. Then burn card.

title: Sunrider Aid
text: The Sunriders favor bold action.
blocka: Add progress tokens to any threat equal to xxRISK. Then burn card.

title: Life on the Steppes
text: Text.
blocka: Gain 2 xxPROGRESS. Then burn card.

title: Ile's Campaign
text: Why put off the inevitable?
blocka: You may draw and put into play an additional threat. Then burn card.

title: Arban's Decree
text: Text.
blocka: Gain 2 xxPROGRESS. Then burn card.

title: Battle Plans
text: Text.

text: Text.

title: Shame To Anger
text: Why can't you just trust my judgement?

title: Moonrider Envoy
text: Text.

title: Favors Returned

text: Text.

title: Graycloak
text: Wait? Who did you say you were here to see?
blocka: Placement: Map Hall
blockb: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Did you hear that?
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I just don't like the way you look.
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Well, they provide three square meals.
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Cool sword, right?
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: One more for the road. And then one more after that.
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I'm just here for the rest and relaxation.
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I've stabbed people for far less. That's the reason I took this job. That and they threatened to kill my family.
blocka: xxACTION Cover Story. Test (Disguise). For every two successes, burn one Guard at this location.

title: A Cold Place
blocka: The streets of Eastkeep are punishing, but secrets are there for the taking - if you're willing to pay the price. You may make a character at this location weary to add three xxPROGRESS. Then burn card.

title: The Thea Dossier
text: You have discovered meticulous notes detailing a campaign to discredit and destroy everything Thea loves.
blocka: Make Thea angry and burn this card.

title: The Resistance
text: There are whispers and rumors of discontent throughout the Empire. Fear keeps the populace from action, but perhaps there are allies to be gained?
blocka: Gain 2 xxPROGRESS and burn card.

title: Radia's Dark Lore
text: Radia is the sage and oracle of Gravewood. She whispers in your ear about Red Bank's dark past, and a growing danger in your midst.
blocka: Optionally, you may gain three xxSECRETS and one character at a Gravewood mission locaion is shattered.

title: Mysterious Technology
text: A black obsidian key, shimmering with highlights of brass, capable of opening almost any lock.
blocka: Play on a character at a Gravewood location.

title: Samo's Humiliations
text: What kind of dung brain doesn't know what snow cat tracks look like? How is it possible that you have survived this long, bereft of both wits and beauty?
blocka: If Samo is in play, Test (Command 2). If you fail, all characters making the test are angry.

title: Imperial Agent
text: They have been caught this time, but what does this presage for the future?
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: The Island of Apples
text: The gods made the island invisible to shield Yari's people from the Sunriders. But the Yarifolk became vain - and stayed too long - and the gods turned Yari into The Weaver, guarding his spider silk of invisibility amongst the undead.
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: Verdant Fields
text: The springs are lush with life, and all is well in the world. Time for rest.
blocka: Gain 1 xxFORTUNE.

title: Keeper of Swords
text: I'm not sure if your fighting spirit is up to the task? Sad, really.

text: The leader of First Haven kept an unrelenting pace through the traces of snow and mud, in singular pursuit of his quarry. While the hunt continued, so did the judgement.
